experience.title: Senior Talent Acquisition Specialist

With expertise in sourcing candidates for roles that require deep knowledge of enterprise integration solutions and API-driven technologies, I leverage innovative recruitment strategies and data-driven insights to build strong pipelines of qualified professionals. My collaborative approach ensures alignment with hiring managers and stakeholders to fulfill critical staffing needs efficiently. Passionate about connecting talent with opportunities, I am committed to delivering exceptional results in fast-paced, high-growth environments.

Leveraging advanced sourcing techniques and a deep understanding of the Salesforce ecosystem, I collaborate closely with hiring managers and stakeholders to align recruitment strategies with business objectives. Passionate about fostering meaningful connections, I am committed to enabling organizational growth and creating impactful partnerships. Working  across EMEA with focus on UK French, German, Spain, Holland & Nordic Markets.

F5 works with many of the world’s leading technology companies to improve manageability, strengthen security, and ensure faster and more successful deployments. Joint customers benefit from the integration and interoperability that result from this close collaboration.

Applications are something we’re passionate about. It’s in our DNA. We enable and secure network infrastructures, from the data center to the cloud, to deliver business applications—and enterprising ideas.

Currently focused on our Sales and Engineering business to help build the stars of the future to help our customers achieve more, faster and more securely.

The role involved close working with multiple HR partners, stakeholders (SVP level), Hiring Managers and the regional Recruitment team to define the recruitment strategy to attract the appropriate skills, specifically sales

The role also included creating strong cost effective partnerships effectively reducing 3rd party supply use by nearly 90%.

experience.title: Recruiting Manager
experience.summary:
My team was comprised of two direct reports, a full-cycle Recruiter and Recruiting Coordinator, and together we managed all of the recruiting efforts at RealSelf. In addition to owning all requisitions across the Customer Success, Product and Executive teams, I partnered with our HR Business Partners and senior leadership to ensure RealSelf's talent strategy aligned with the company's growth plans. 

Notable hires: Chief Technology Officer, Chief Brand & Communications Officer, Chief Operating Officer, Chief Marketing Officer.

experience.title: Senior Recruiter
experience.summary: In this role I partnered with our Customer Success and Executive teams to fill roles of varying levels, from SDR's to CMO's, with a 96% offer acceptance rate. In addition to managing a full requisition load, I managed and mentored a Recruiting Coordinator and worked alongside an HR Business Partner.

experience.title: Recruiter
experience.summary:
Since its founding in 2006, RealSelf has created the world's largest community for learning and sharing information about cosmetic surgery, dermatology, dentistry, and other elective treatments. Our extensive collections of reviews, photos, videos and doctor Q&A make RealSelf the most trusted resource for those who are looking for help beyond the beauty counter.

A longtime fan and user of RealSelf, I joined the company in June of 2016. Over the course of my first 18 months I hired 60 individuals across the following verticals:  Sales, Sales Operations, B2B Marketing, B2C Marketing, Analytics, Corporate and Product.

experience.title: Recruiter
experience.summary:
Porch.com is the free home network that connects homeowners and renters with the right home service professionals based on who neighbors have used, project and cost history, and friend and neighbors' endorsements. In addition, Porch helps home professionals get more business, better exposure, and higher revenue with free business profiles and paid marketing & analytics tools.

∙Managed full cycle recruiting process including candidate generation, direct sourcing, scheduling, interviewing, and closing
∙Developed relationships with hiring managers to fully understand business needs and objectives to hire the right talent
∙Hired 118 employees during first year across Sales, Customer Success and Support teams
∙Recommended and implemented ideas and strategies to build pipeline of candidates, streamline processes, and improve candidate experience
∙Grew company recruiting brand by hosting hiring events and partnering with local universities and other startups in Seattle
∙Represented Porch at UW MBA "Careers at Startups" panel
∙Created internal contests and incentives to drive increase in employee referrals
∙Maintained Applicant Tracking System (Taleo Business Edition)

experience.title: Sales Recruiter (Contract)

PayScale’s products are powered by innovative search and query algorithms that dynamically acquire, analyze and aggregate compensation information for millions of individuals in real time.

∙Creatively sourced and engaged with candidates using LinkedIn, numerous job boards and social media in an effort to find the best talent for PayScale's growing sales organization
∙Conducted phone interviews and shared notes with Senior Recruiter along with recommendation of any next steps
∙Worked closely with Senior Recruiter to help organize and facilitate first company hiring event

experience.title: Recruiter
experience.company: Simply Measured, A Sprout Social Company
experience.summary:
Simply Measured is a fast-growing team of data geeks dedicated to making the world of analytics and reporting a better, more beautiful place. Our goal is to put the tools to understand business data in the hands of business users. We think reporting should be simple, beautiful, and accessible for everyone – not just data scientists. Our software streamlines the process from data to deliverables and eliminates the countless hours spent on everyday reporting tasks. We do this by putting cloud data sources at your fingertips, providing a marketplace of best practice reports, and generating beautiful deliverables on the web, in Excel, and in PowerPoint with a couple of clicks.

∙Filled 40 positions within an 8-month period

I manage the full-cycle corporate recruiting process for Onni's vertically integrated departments spanning from sales & marketing, accounting & finance,  IT, human resources, construction, property management, legal, leasing, interior design & development. experience.title: Senior Human Resources Executive
experience.summary:
• Act as the de facto CHRO for dozens of Gusto clients, providing strategic HR solutions and navigating employee relations, compensation, and compliance.
• Lead and inspire a team of 7 talented HR Partners
• Consultant and SME on all common and non-traditional HR and People Operations issues.
• Define and execute HR strategies to solve day-to-day HR problems for clients, ensuring all their HR needs are met effectively.
• Collaborate with clients to develop and implement HR policies and procedures, fostering a positive work environment and enhancing employee engagement.

experience.title: Consulting Head of People
experience.summary:
Help various organizations solve complex Human Resources problems. Partnering with C-Suite executives, I've been acting as the SME on common and non-traditional HR and People Operations issues.

Special projects include:

* Grover Group (Newark, CA 2022 - present)
Acting Head of People for several clients of this holding company. Responsible for full spectrum of HR from day-to-day employee relations issues to strategic consulting. People Operations, HRIS and ATS administration, Performance Management, Talent Acquisition, Compensation Analysis and more. Day-to-day advisory services for founders. 

* Catholic Charities of the East Bay (Hayward, CA 2021)
I was tasked with preparing the Agency for its upcoming COA accreditation. As part of the process, I spearheaded an audit of all existing HR policies and procedures. I also led a compensation analysis project, including job leveling and salary compression studies. Additionally, working with the CEO, I was also focusing on performance management and personnel development initiatives.

* TrueCare24 (San Francisco, CA 2020)
Defined global human capital strategies, designed processes, championed culture initiatives, promoted diversity and inclusion, mitigated risk, ensured compliance as well as evaluated and hired talent worldwide (US, Eastern Europe, India). Company advisor on all HR and People Ops related matters.

Built out new compensation model. Researched, designed and negotiated Company's first ever benefits plan.

experience.title: Adjunct Instructor
experience.summary:
Design and teach online and in-person Business classes.

* BUS 28 - Human Relations in the Workplace
* BUS 22 - Principles of Management
* BUS 1A - Financial Accounting
* BUS 2A - Intermediate Accounting

experience.title: VP of People
experience.summary:
* Led a 12-person distributed team (People Operations, Culture & Engagement, Talent Acquisition, Facilities) for a privately held big data company. 
* Led companywide HR efforts, promoted culture, created cohesiveness among team members, and spearheaded company People initiatives. 
* Promoted company via appearances at conferences, local and national networking events, and podcasts. 
* Introduced new L&D initiatives and career pathing. Lead OKR, performance management, and compensation processes. 
* Designed compensation and commission structure for the newly created B2B sales team. Led 401(k) and compliance audits. 
* Managed immigration and visa sponsorship processes. 
* Implemented pay transparency and diversity initiatives in hiring. 
* Achieved average 91% eSAT score (19% improvement) and reduced time-to-hire by 16 days while managing to unwanted attrition of 1.2%. 
* Responsible for company award wins (Best Perks, Best Employee Happiness, Best Compensation, and Best Place to Work) for the first time in company history.

experience.title: Global Head of People
experience.summary:
* Led worldwide HR efforts, promoted culture, created cohesiveness, and supported hypergrowth at a multinational fintech organization. 
* Oversaw global human resources for employees in the United States, Singapore, the United Kingdom and EU. 
* Built high functioning HR department from scratch and stood up OKR and performance management processes. 
* Managed a worldwide team of specialized external recruiters. 

* Oversaw 45% headcount growth with <9% worldwide attrition during The Great Resignation. 
* Managed payroll and benefits for employees worldwide. 
* Designed and introduced new commission and bonus structure. Issued equity grants; created and maintained cap table. 
* Introduced career pathing and L&D initiatives to improve job satisfaction by 21%. 

* Mediated employee conflicts and defused challenging workplace situations. 
* Responsible for Board level interaction and companywide communications.

experience.title: Head of People
experience.summary:
As Instawork's first HR/People Operations hire, I was responsible for the entire HR cycle. From recruiting and onboarding to payroll and compliance, from training and development to budgeting and headcount planning, I did it all. 

As a member of Instawork's executive team and CEO's strategic partner, I helped drive critical personnel decisions. I was also proud to define and drive a culture that embodied our values, and created compensation models and performance management mechanisms that made it possible to attract and retain top talent.

Instawork is the hospitality industry’s essential hiring engine. We connect professionals to full-time, part-time, and temporary work opportunities.  We enable gig workers to manage their own schedules and make extra money. We enable thousands of hospitality businesses with experienced, reliable, high quality professional on-demand talent to fill staffing gaps.

experience.title: Global Head of HR
experience.summary:
I managed the human resources function for our global (US, UK, Israel) 300+ person organization. Responsible for all aspects of HR, including compliance, human relations, payroll, onboarding, benefits administration and recruiting. I built our HR department from the ground up. Together (with HR partners in the US, UK, and Israel) provided world class service to our employees while ensuring compliance. Developed and oversaw complex commission and bonus structures. Resolved and mediated difficult employee conflicts. Engaged in headcount planning and workforce management. Promoted corporate culture, L&D and DEI initiatives. Responsible for performance management and employee engagement.

Before transitioning into a purely human resources role, I acted as the VP of Finance and Administration. I managed accounting, finance and human resources functions for our growing and profitable Company. I was also responsible for compliance, as well as our supplier, banking, vendor and partner relationships.

Resident Home was acquired by Ashley Home in March 2024.

experience.title: Global Human Resources Director
experience.summary:
Betable was an exciting, well funded, rapidly growing startup. It was the only platform that allowed developers to legally offer real-money gambling in their games. Betable was licensed by the UKGC (United Kingdom Gambling Commission). With our licenses, we could offer a wide range of gambling and betting services to players in legal gambling jurisdictions.

With the help of outsourced accounting and HR teams in the United States and the United Kingdom, handle all financial, personnel and administrative matters of the Company and its subsidiaries. 

Responsible for full cycle people operations, from recruiting to onboarding to development. Administered benefits and promoted corporate culture. Ensured Betable was a great place to work. 
 
Oversee financial statement preparation and consolidation. Manage Betable's complex international banking structure and maintain a sophisticated operational model. Responsible for BOD reporting and investor updates. First point of contact for legal and compliance issues.

Company was acquired by an investor in the United Kingdom in 2017.

experience.title: Human Resources Director
experience.summary:
Madison Reed is a successful, well funded, rapidly growing startup destined to revolutionize the professional hair care industry. I built out and subsequently managed accounting, finance and human resources functions for the Company. 

I transformed the Company's Human Resources department from a file cabinet in the supply closet to a world class HR department. I promoted corporate culture and ensured Madison Reed was a great place to work. I negotiated and put in place the Company's first benefits plan and 401(k) plan. I resolved employee disputes and instilled Company values. 

I also handled our fulfillment vendor relationships and managed our inventory. I was responsible for negotiations and financial board reporting. I often made coffee for the entire office and occasionally streamed Major League Baseball games at work.

experience.title: VP of Finance & Administration
experience.summary:
Managed human resources, administrative, finance and accounting functions. Responsible for full range of Human Resources and administrative functions, as well long-term and short-term planning and forecasting. Developed strategies to reduce tax exposure for S-Corp and its shareholders. Advised Chairman and CEO on all employee and financial matters. Optimized benefits, managed compensation plans and increased employee morale. Performed competitive analyses; measured profitability and ROI.  Managed short-term investments. Oversaw day-to-day operations (A/P, A/R, payroll, fixed assets). Managed all client, partner and vendor relationships.

Facilitated sale of the Company to a private investor.

current_experience.summary:
Help various organizations solve complex Human Resources problems. Partnering with C-Suite executives, I've been acting as the SME on common and non-traditional HR and People Operations issues.

Special projects include:

* Grover Group (Newark, CA 2022 - present)
Acting Head of People for several clients of this holding company. Responsible for full spectrum of HR from day-to-day employee relations issues to strategic consulting. People Operations, HRIS and ATS administration, Performance Management, Talent Acquisition, Compensation Analysis and more. Day-to-day advisory services for founders. 

* Catholic Charities of the East Bay (Hayward, CA 2021)
I was tasked with preparing the Agency for its upcoming COA accreditation. As part of the process, I spearheaded an audit of all existing HR policies and procedures. I also led a compensation analysis project, including job leveling and salary compression studies. Additionally, working with the CEO, I was also focusing on performance management and personnel development initiatives.

* TrueCare24 (San Francisco, CA 2020)
Defined global human capital strategies, designed processes, championed culture initiatives, promoted diversity and inclusion, mitigated risk, ensured compliance as well as evaluated and hired talent worldwide (US, Eastern Europe, India). Company advisor on all HR and People Ops related matters.

Built out new compensation model. Researched, designed and negotiated Company's first ever benefits plan.

current_experience.title: Adjunct Instructor
current_experience.summary:
Design and teach online and in-person Business classes.

* BUS 28 - Human Relations in the Workplace
* BUS 22 - Principles of Management
* BUS 1A - Financial Accounting
* BUS 2A - Intermediate Accounting
